title: Best of The Herd: 07/04/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 07/04/2019
description:
Colin celebrates the 4th of July by declaring independence and gaining back our freedom from several oppressive forces in sports! Kawhi has been so quiet with his upcoming free agency decision that its creating commotion among the three NBA teams impacted the most with his choice. Kevin Durant's vibe wasn't the right match at all with the Golden State Warriors creating constant tension and if Kevin Durant couldn't get along with Steve Kerr, a true players coach, then who will be able to please him?

Guest : Cuttino Mobley - 11 year NBA veteran

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
